ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Issue_Category__c,"Convert to Intapp Product"), ISPICKVAL(Issue_Category__c,"Custom Approach") ), NOT(Approved_to_stay_on_TFG__c), ISPICKVAL(PMP_Stage__c,"9. Rejected Intapp Migration. No further efforts."), NOT($Profile.Id="00e30000000bvR3") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This PMP is not approved to stay on a TFG product. Please contact Don or Sig for such approval.
